## gk mcp

Start a local MCP server for your favorite MCP client to interact with

### Synopsis


Start a local MCP server for your favorite MCP client to interact with.
For more information please visit https://help.gitkraken.com/cli/gk-cli-mcp.


```
gk mcp [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for mcp
```
